verses.verse: And when <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6166>Arad<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H5045>south<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> tell that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H871>spies<s%>; then he <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H7617>took<s%> some of them <S%H7628>prisoners<s%>.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, If thou wilt <S%H5414>indeed<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, then I will utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> their <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and delivered <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>; and they utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them and their <S%H5892>cities<s%>: and he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H2767>Hormah<s%>. Hormah: that is, Utter destruction

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, to <S%H5437>compass<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>: and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> was much <S%H7114>discouraged<s%> because of the <S%H1870>way<s%>. discouraged: or, grieved: Heb. shortened

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> against <S%H430>God<s%>, and against <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Wherefore have ye brought us <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>? for there is no <S%H3899>bread<s%>, neither is there any <S%H4325>water<s%>; and our <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6973>loatheth<s%> this <S%H7052>light<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5175>serpents<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and they <S%H5391>bit<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>; and <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, for we have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and against thee; <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that he take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5175>serpents<s%> from us. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H6213>Make<s%> thee a fiery <S%H8314>serpent<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> it upon a <S%H5251>pole<s%>: and it shall come to pass, that every one that is <S%H5391>bitten<s%>, when he <S%H7200>looketh<s%> upon it, shall <S%H2425>live<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> it upon a <S%H5251>pole<s%>, and it came to pass, that if a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> had <S%H5391>bitten<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%>, when he <S%H5027>beheld<s%> the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>, he <S%H2425>lived<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H88>Oboth<s%>.

And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H88>Oboth<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> at <S%H5863>Ijeabarim<s%>, in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, toward the <S%H4217>sunrising<s%> <S%H8121><s%>. Ijeabarim: or, heaps of Abarim
From thence they <S%H5265>removed<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H2218>Zared<s%>.

From thence they <S%H5265>removed<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, which is in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> that cometh <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>: for <S%H769>Arnon<s%> is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, between <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>.

Wherefore it is <S%H559>said<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4421>wars<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, What he <S%H2052>did<s%> in the Red <S%H5492>sea<s%>, and in the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, What: or, Vaheb in Suphah

And at the <S%H793>stream<s%> of the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> that goeth <S%H5186>down<s%> to the <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> of <S%H6144>Ar<s%>, and <S%H8172>lieth<s%> upon the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>. lieth: Heb. leaneth

And from thence they went to <S%H876>Beer<s%>: that is the <S%H875>well<s%> whereof the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H622>Gather<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H622>together<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H4325>water<s%>.
Then <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7891>sang<s%> this <S%H7892>song<s%>, Spring <S%H5927>up<s%>, O <S%H875>well<s%>; <S%H6030>sing<s%> ye unto it: Spring: Heb. Ascend sing: or, answer

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H2658>digged<s%> the <S%H875>well<s%>, the <S%H5081>nobles<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3738>digged<s%> it, by the direction of the <S%H2710>lawgiver<s%>, with their <S%H4938>staves<s%>. And from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> they went to <S%H4980>Mattanah<s%>:
And from <S%H4980>Mattanah<s%> to <S%H5160>Nahaliel<s%>: and from <S%H5160>Nahaliel<s%> to <S%H1120>Bamoth<s%>:

And from <S%H1120>Bamoth<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%>, that is in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah<s%>, which <S%H8259>looketh<s%> <S%H6440>toward<s%> <S%H3452>Jeshimon<s%>. country: Heb. field Pisgah: or, the hill Jeshimon: or, the wilderness
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Let me <S%H5674>pass<s%> through thy <S%H776>land<s%>: we will not <S%H5186>turn<s%> into the <S%H7704>fields<s%>, or into the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>; we will not <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H875>well<s%>: but we will go <S%H3212>along<s%> by the <S%H4428>king's<s%> high <S%H1870>way<s%>, until we be <S%H5674>past<s%> thy <S%H1366>borders<s%>.

And <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> would not <S%H5414>suffer<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through his <S%H1366>border<s%>: but <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> all his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H622>together<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: and he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%>, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> him with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H769>Arnon<s%> unto <S%H2999>Jabbok<s%>, even unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>: for the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> was <S%H5794>strong<s%>.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> all these <S%H5892>cities<s%>: and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and in all the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof. villages: Heb. daughters

For <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> was the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, who had <S%H3898>fought<s%> against the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and <S%H3947>taken<s%> all his <S%H776>land<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, even unto <S%H769>Arnon<s%>.

Wherefore they that speak in <S%H4911>proverbs<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H935>Come<s%> into <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, let the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> be <S%H1129>built<s%> and <S%H3559>prepared<s%>:

For there is a <S%H784>fire<s%> gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, a <S%H3852>flame<s%> from the <S%H7151>city<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%>: it hath <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H6144>Ar<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and the lords of the high <S%H1181>places<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon<s%>.

<S%H188>Woe<s%> to thee, <S%H4124>Moab<s%>! thou art <S%H6>undone<s%>, O <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%>: he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> that <S%H6412>escaped<s%>, and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, into <S%H7622>captivity<s%> unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>.

We have <S%H3384>shot<s%> at them; <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> is <S%H6>perished<s%> even unto <S%H1769>Dibon<s%>, and we have laid them <S%H8074>waste<s%> even unto <S%H5302>Nophah<s%>, which reacheth unto <S%H4311>Medeba<s%>.
Thus <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to spy <S%H7270>out<s%> <S%H3270>Jaazer<s%>, and they <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof, and drove <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H3423><s%> the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> that were there.

And they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>: and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> them, he, and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>, to the <S%H4421>battle<s%> at <S%H154>Edrei<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> him not: for I have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and his <S%H776>land<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> to him as thou <S%H6213>didst<s%> unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>.

So they <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>, until there was <S%H1115>none<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> him <S%H8300>alive<s%>: and they <S%H3423>possessed<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%>.
